mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERFILE (FILENUM, ID, FILENAME, ORINAME) VALUES(FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW=#{pw}
SELECT ID, M.NAME, M.PHONE, M.EMAIL, MF.FILENAME, MF.FILENUM, MF.ORINAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN MEMBERFILE MF USING(ID) WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME=#{name}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE ID=#{id}
